item.title: Contribution to the debate about the organization of Magento development teams
item.description: For the development process to be carried out, there is necessarily an analysis practice to convert the client’s need into a “requirement” and a “architecture” job to define how that requirement will be implemented. These two tasks are always present, it would not be possible to move forward without doing this. I have noticed in many cases that agencies do not do this analysis / architecture process or do so very limited.
